segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen scene, a very detailed line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how much is happening in one glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is running, and water is just pouring out of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a considerable puddle on the floor right where she's standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in the water, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, focused entirely on that plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious she is to the growing flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily streaming over the cabinet doors below the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to some serious water damage if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip when she eventually moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a strange juxtaposition of calm and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain must be completely blocked for the water to overflow so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the moment she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a peculiar sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR
